name: Hey Nelly!
tag_list: team, social-media, entrpreneur, consumer-web, sports, clubs, groups, family, facebook, twitter, linkedin
description: The smart team platform connecting teams
overview:
Based in Boston, Ma, HeyNelly.com is the smart team-based social platform instantly connecting teammates old and new. We believe some of the most important relationships you have are team-based, including sports, family, military, clubs, or groups. We treat them that way, and take away all of the work of inviting them one-at-a-time.

People are passionate about their connections. Life is all about who your surround yourself with. Our goal is to make keeping in touch, networking, supporting, and motivating you and your teammates easy and meaningful.

How much have you achieved by yourself? How much have your achieved with your team or teams? Do your current social networks support your endeavors, and elevate who you are as a person, or just the opposite?

Surround yourself with your network of teammates, of supporters, who want to see you succeed, reach your dreams, and achieve more than you could if you’re by yourself. This isn’t about one profile, and a mass group of surface-level connections. This is about you, and giving you direct access to some of your most meaningful, supportive, and caring relationships.
